Version 1.3.1:
Fixed some bugs in Game Center.
Fine improvement.

Ninimaths Ver.2 has been completed.

Functions:
Division mode was added.
The number of digits can now be set up to 5 digits.
The number of digits can be set for each calculation mode.
You can individually set the number of digits for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

UI improvements:
A keypad for holding one hand was added.
Night mode was added.
Reduced the number of taps when switching settings.

Device support:
Support iPhone X.
Support iPad.
Support Slide Over and Split View.

More:
In order to conform to the latest iOS device, I rebuilt Ninimaths completely from scratch without changing the design as much as possible.
If you have any comments, please contact from the in-app mail form.
Fixed some bugs.
